import React, { useState, useEffect, Component } from 'react' import './static/style.css' import signinImg from './img/signin.jpg' import logo from './img/logo.svg' import signupImg from './img/signup.jpg' export default class Login extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.signInBtn = React.createRef(); this.signUpBtn = React.createRef(); this.container = React.createRef(); this.handleSigninClick = this.handleSigninClick.bind(this); this.handleSignupClick = this.handleSignupClick.bind(this); } handleSignupClick = () => { const container = this.container.current; container.classNameList.add("sign-up-mode"); console.log("Signin clicked"); } handleSigninClick = () => { const container = this.container.current; container.classNameList.remove("sign-up-mode"); console.log("Signup clicked"); } render() { return (
